description: Children up to the age of 11 go back to class more than a month after their schools were shut down.
title: Coronavirus: Denmark lets young children return to school
title_page: Coronavirus: Denmark lets young children return to school - BBC News
maintext: One parent told the BBC that schools in her area were not going to open until Monday. She added that there was concern that authorities would try to enforce the return to school on children of families who had people at high risk from the virus living at home.
